original_text: And the company shall stone them with stones, and dispatch them with their swords; they shall slay their sons and their daughters, and burn up their houses with fire.
korean_text: 무리가 그들을 돌로 치며 칼로 죽이고 그 자녀도 죽이며 그 집들을 불사르리라

sentences.original_text: And the company shall stone them with stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 무리가 그들을 돌로 칠 것이며

sentences.original_text: and dispatch them with their swords
they shall slay their sons and their daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 아들들과 딸들을 죽일 것이며

sentences.original_text: and burn up their houses with fire
